rotateZUp.title: Convert Z-Up to Y-Up
rotateZUp.description: turns rotation to z-axis pointing upwards on/off

fixAnimationData.title: Clean Up Animation Data
fixAnimationData.description: cleans up weights so they sum up to 1 and assigns bone 0 for 0-weights

normalmapYFlip.title: Normal Map Y Flip
normalmapYFlip.description: flip normalmaps Y axis on import

general.title: General Import Settings
general.description: Settings applied on all import data

profile.title: USD Import Profile
profile.description: defines how input USD files are interpreted

purpose.title: USD Purpose
purpose.description: Defines the purpose of rendering a prim, used to control render visibility and classify prims into visibility categories

USD.title: USD Import Settings
USD.description: Settings applied to all usd file imports

tessellationResolution.title: Tessellation Resolution
tessellationResolution.description: Tessellation resolution for imported CAD surfaces

CAD.title: CAD Import Settings
CAD.description: Settings applied to all CAD file imports

cameras.title: Discard Cameras
cameras.description: if true, discards any imported cameras

lights.title: Discard Lights
lights.description: if true, discards any imported lights

animations.title: Discard Animations
animations.description: if true, discards any imported animations

morphTargets.title: Discard Morph Targets
morphTargets.description: if true, discards any imported morph targets (shape keys, blend shapes)

unusedUVs.title: Discard unused UV sets
unusedUVs.description: if true, discards unused UV sets (if possible)

discard.title: Discard Properties on Import
discard.description: Properties of a 3D asset to discard on import.

method.title: Flattening Method
method.description: method to be used for scene graph flattening

preservedSceneDepth.title: Preserved Scene Depth Level
preservedSceneDepth.description: number of layers in the scene structure that should not be flattened

sceneGraphFlattening.title: Scene Graph Flattening
sceneGraphFlattening.description: Full control over scene graph, specifying how nodes are merged or kept.

recomputeInputNormals.title: Recompute Input Normals
recomputeInputNormals.description: if true, discards the original normals and recomputes them

hardAngleThreshold.title: Normal Hard Angle Threshold (Degrees)
hardAngleThreshold.description: hard threshold (degrees) used for normal generation (0 = everything flat, 180 = everything smooth)

computationMethod.title: Normal Computation Method
computationMethod.description: weighting method for computation of mesh normals

scalingFactor.title: Scaling Factor
scalingFactor.description: asset scaling before export, does not affect asset for further processing

centerModel.title: Center Model
centerModel.description: centers the model around the coordinate origin before export

modelEdit.title: Model Edit
modelEdit.description: Settings applied directly to the Geometry or Mesh Node(s) of a 3D asset

oneOf.title: Cube Unwrapping
oneOf.description: Applies cube unwrapping

method.title: Unwrapping Method
method.description: method to be used for UV unwrapping

segmentationChartAngle.title: Segmentation Chart Angle (Degrees)
segmentationChartAngle.description: threshold (degrees) for overall curvature of 3D charts

maxAngleError.title: Maximum Angle Error (Degrees)
maxAngleError.description: the maximum angle (degrees) difference between UV and 3D space beyond which a chart is split and re-unwrapped

maxPrimitivesPerChart.title: Maximum Primitives per UV Chart
maxPrimitivesPerChart.description: limits max number primitives in any UV chart

cutOverlappingPieces.title: Cut Overlapping UV Pieces
cutOverlappingPieces.description: turns removal of UV self-overlaps through cutting on/off

atlasMode.title: UV Atlas Mode
atlasMode.description: mode used to assign meshes to atlases

allowRectangularAtlases.title: Allow Rectangular Atlases
allowRectangularAtlases.description: create rectangular POT textures when beneficial for auto sized textures

packingResolution.title: Packing Resolution
packingResolution.description: resolution at which packing will be computed

packingPixelDistance.title: Packing Pixel Distance
packingPixelDistance.description: distance in pixels packing will keep at reference packing resolution

alphaBlendToMaskThreshold.title: Alpha Blend to Mask Conversion Threshold
alphaBlendToMaskThreshold.description: use alpha masking instead of blending when the alpha map has same or more than the given fraction of black or white pixels

alphaMapToOpaqueThreshold.description: consider the material opaque if the alpha map mean value is above the given value [0, 1]

3dEdit.description: Modify the asset, including generation of new Uvs, assignment of new textures, centering the model, and more.

perMesh.title: Per Mesh
perMesh.description: switches visibility computation between per mesh and global

quality.title: Culling Quality
quality.description: specify how fast or thorough triangle visibility should be determined

ignoreTransparency.title: Ignore Transparency
ignoreTransparency.description: culling will not consider geometry as visible anymore, if occluded by geometry associated with transparent materials

runAfterDecimator.title: Run After Decimator
runAfterDecimator.description: if true, removes occluded (invisible) triangles after decimation

diffusion.title: Visibility Diffusion
diffusion.description: control if neighbours of visible triangles are also flagged as visible

percentage.title: Relative Percentage (bbox)
percentage.description: percentage (relative to the scene's bounding box) defining the largest mesh lump bbox sidelength considered small

oneOf.title: Relative Percentage (bbox)
oneOf.description: percentage (relative to the scene's bounding box) defining the largest mesh lump bbox sidelength considered small

value.title: Value (scene units)
value.description: absolute value (in scene units), defining the largest mesh lump bbox sidelength considered small

oneOf.title: Value (scene units)
oneOf.description: absolute value (in scene units), defining the largest mesh lump bbox sidelength considered small

sizeThreshold.title: Size Threshold
sizeThreshold.description: choice between Relative Percentage (bbox) or Value (scene units)

runAfterDecimator.title: Run After Decimator
runAfterDecimator.description: if true, removes small features (mesh lumps) after decimation

meshCulling.title: Mesh Culling
meshCulling.description: Removal of small features or invisible interior geometry

percentage.title: Faces Percentage

preserveMaterialBorders.title: Preserve Material Borders

collapseUnconnectedVertices.description: switches collapsing of nearby, unconnected vertices on/off

boundaryPreservationFactor.description: factor to steer preservation of boundaries during decimation

method.description: method for the initial remeshing process

simplification.title: Animation Curve Simplification

optimize.title: Optimize
optimize.description: Optimization of mesh and material data, including options for decimation, remeshing, texture atlas baking, uv aggregation, and more.

maxMegabytesOnDisk.title: Maximum Megabytes On Disk

oneOf.description: Modifier which alters the optimization settings in order to meet a given maximum file size (MB)
